meta.description: Código Obsidiana - Personal website and blog of Ariel Molina. Software development, web technologies, and programming tutorials.

about.title: About Me
about.tagline: Crafting elegant digital experiences with the resilience of obsidian and the precision of code.
about.description: Passionate about creating accessible and performant web applications.

summary.title: Professional Journey
summary.content: I find inspiration in the duality of obsidian - both raw and refined, powerful yet elegant. My expertise lies in creating web experiences that combine robust architecture with thoughtful design. I focus on accessibility and performance, transforming complex technical challenges into seamless, beautiful interfaces that stand the test of time.

education.title: Education
education.description: Focused on software engineering and web development.
